name: Flaky Ingenue
quote: "Excuse me, darling. What is it exactly that you DO do?"
abilities: 'Male' Characters in her Movie are at -1 Defense and gain the Trait 'Unlucky'. May be played into an Opponent's Movie.
title: Blonde

name: Van Helsing
quote: "Stakeouts are for detectives. I prefer stake-ins."
abilities: Defense = 5 against 'Vampire' attacks. Defense = 8 if it's against a "Dracula".
title: Van

name: Jonathan Harker
quote: "Should have hired a better real estate agent... and maybe a vampire slayer."
abilities: When Harker is cast in your Movie, search your deck for a Location and place it into your hand. Reshuffle your deck afterwards.
title: Estate

name: Hammered Dracula
quote: "To eternal life, or at least until the next happy hour!"
abilities: 'Drunk' Characters cannot defend against Hammered Dracula, and you may play 'Booze' Props on him for free, each 'Booze' Prop doubling his Attack.
title: Drink

name: Dracula's Brides
quote: "Flitting around in their nightwear all over the place... distractingly..." GAK!
abilities: If successful you may claim one more Victim. Can be combined into a single attack with any "Dracula".
title: Brides

name: Vampire Baron
quote: "Now, now mother... come along with me!"
abilities: Always succeeds against a Movie with a "Mom", "Momma", or "Mother" in it.
title: Mommy

name: Creepy Old Castle
quote: "The car's dead, what are we going to do?" "There's a light over at the Count's place."
abilities: Defense = -5 against 'Supernatural' attacks.
title: Stone

name: Boudoir
quote: "Vampires, corsets, and tea. Life as Dracula's bride is interesting."
abilities:
'Indoors' — May be Combined with an existing 'Building'.

'Virgin' Characters gain +1 Defense here.
title: Lace

name: Filmy Nightgown
quote: "So sheer, even ghosts envy it."
abilities: Defense = 3 on a 'Female' Character. Defense = -2 on a 'Male' Character. May be played into an Opponent's Movie.
title: Transparent

name: Mirror
quote: "Mirror mirror on the wall, who's the biggest badass of them all?"
abilities: When the Mirror comes into play, choose a Trait. Every time an Opponent draws a card with that Trait, they must reveal it to you before it goes into their hand. If they don't, once discovered you may place the card in your hand.
title: Quicksilver

name: Improvised Cross
quote: "Back, foul monster!"
abilities: Stop a 'Supernatural' attack if the targeted Movie has a Character who is holding exactly two Props.
title: Back

name: Bathtub Full of Blood
quote: "Blast... drain's clogged again."
abilities: Kill any 'Virgin' Character in play. Then attach this card to one of your Characters. They gain the Traits 'Supernatural' and 'Young'.
title: Gore

name: Blood on the Ashes
quote: "Ow! Papercut..."
abilities: Bring a 'Vampire' from your Graveyard back into your hand.
title: Catastrophe

name: ...And She Fell into Their Embrace!
quote: "Don't be afraid, my dear. We are bound by a force even stronger than fear."
abilities: Beginning your next turn, if an Opponent has a 'Female' Character you may Bank this Twist. If you do, her owner may re-assign her Props. Play her in your Movie. She gains the Trait 'Ghoul' (Cannot defend against 'Vampire' attacks).
title: Embrace

name: ...And They Were Bitten By The Vampire!
quote: "Because regular hickeys are so last century."
abilities: Starting your next turn you may Bank this Twist if there is at least one non-'Vampire' Character in play. If you do, they gain the Trait: 'Vampire' [May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Cannot defend against 'Vampire' attacks). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.]
title: Nibble

name: Roll the Credits! (1)
quote: "Well, the Vampire was shadow-puppeted to death with a cross, so I guess it's over!"
title: Hammer

name: Crazy Old Grandad
quote: "One thing about living here I never could stomach. All the damn vampires!"
abilities: 'Vehicle' Props' Defense is double when on the Crazy Old Grandad.
title: Loony

name: Edgy Big Brother
quote: "Look! This isn't a comic book!"
abilities: Defense = 4 if there are any 'Young' or 'College' Characters are in the same Movie.
title: Swagger

name: Cute Vampire Girl
quote: "Lemmie give you a 'kiss' for luck?"
abilities:
Tip a 'Male' in your Movie during an attack — The Vampire Girl gains Defense equal to half the 'Male's Defense, rounded down until the end of the attack.

'Vampire' — May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Cannot defend against 'Vampires'). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.
title: Kiss

name: Master Vampire
quote: "Never invite a vampire into your home, dear boy. Because then he eats your face!"
abilities: 'Young' or 'College' Characters cannot defend against the Master. May be played as a Special Effect to quadruple the "Teenage Vampire Hoods" or double any other 'Vampire' Attack.
title: Master

name: Alpha Vampire
quote: "Come on, be one of us!"
abilities: 'Vampires' cannot defend against the Alpha.
title: Alpha

name: Teenage Vampire Hoods
quote: "C'mon Billy!" "Yeah Billy!" "Let's go Billy!" "Peer pressure, Billy!" "Biiiilly!" "Billy?"
abilities: 'Gains' +2 Attack for every 'Neighborhood' card in the target Movie.
title: Hoods

name: Railway Bridge
quote: "Wait... I see a light!"
abilities: After you Fill Up at the beginning of the turn you must pay 2 Popcorn, or the train comes. If that happens, all Characters at this Location die. You may pay 1 Popcorn per Character you want to save. After this the Railway Bridge is discarded.
title: Locomotive

name: Boardwalk at Night
quote: "Step right up! Step right up!"
abilities:
'Events' can Combine with an existing Location that shares a Trait other than 'Event'.

Pay 2 Popcorn on your turn — Reveal the top card of your Deck. If it's a Prop, you may play it into your Movie. Otherwise discard it.
title: Shore

name: Water Pistol
quote: "It's holy water."
abilities: Defense = 5 against 'Supernatural' OR 'Vampire' attacks.
title: Soaked

name: Old Pickup Truck
quote: "Who's got the keys?" "Billy." "Aaaaand would this be Billy's severed head in the toilet?"
abilities: Any time your movie loses one or more Props, you may give one of them to the owner of the Pickup.
title: Satan

name: Vampire Romance
quote: "So tragic!" "Uh... It don't look so tragic. They're comin' right at us!"
abilities: Play in your Movie and designate one 'Vampire' and one NON-'Vampire' NON-'Virgin' Character to be lovers. If one is involved in a Duel, you may tip the other one to add their Defense as if they were dueling to the attack. If one dies, discard this card.
title: Silver

name: Bat Transformation
quote: "Bats! Why did it have to be bats?!"
abilities: If the current attack is a 'Vampire' attack, you may either grant it the trait 'Swarm' OR if it's yours you may return it to your hand.
title: Wings

name: Random Musical Number
quote: "What, are we in a Disney movie?"
abilities: Play this card in your Movie. All attacks made until the start of your next turn cost one less Popcorn. It is discarded afterwards.
title: Pipes

name: ...And They Were the Master Vampire All Along!
quote: "It was noble of you. But prophecies are tricky creatures."
abilities: If you have at least two 'Vampires' in your Movie and one Non-'Vamprire' Character, you may Bank this Twist. Remove the Non-'Vampire' from the game. Bank their Printed Defense. Search your deck for a 'Vampire' Character and play them in your Movie. Attach this card to them. They now have +3 Defense. Shuffle your deck.
title: Double

name:
...And They Drove
Straight Through It!
quote: "Brace for impact!!!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if you have a Character with a 'Vehicle' Prop and there is a Location anywhere in play, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, discard the 'Vehicle', Bank its Printed Defense, and discard the Location.
title: Obliteration

name: Roll the Credits! (2)
quote: "Well, the house is absolutely destroyed but hey, there are still drinks in the fridge! So I guess it's over!"
title: Summer

name: Vampire Slayer
quote: "Huh. That's an unusual name."
abilities: Defense = 5 against 'Vampire' and 'Supernatural' attacks, and 'Supernatural' Props are at +2 Defense in her hands.
title: Somebody

name: Romantic Vamp Boy
quote: "I'm 218 years old! You can't understand me!"
abilities:
Defense = 0 if your Movie does not have a 'Female' Character in it.

'Vampire' — May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Defense against 'Vampire' attacks = 0). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.
title: Devil

name: Hot Cockney Vampire
quote: "Hey love. Hows about you make yourself useful?"
abilities:
'Female' Characters in the same Movie gain +1 Defense.

'Vampire' — May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Defense against 'Vampire' attacks = 0). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.
title: Nail

name: Evil Mayor
quote: "Not now! I have a virgin to sacrifice and a campaign to win."
abilities: When the Mayor attacks, each Player casts one yea or nay vote for every Character they have in their Movie. If the yeas win, the Mayor succeeds. (Ties don't count.) If not, the attack proceeds as normal.
title: Mayor

name: Vampire Mooks
quote: "Whoa! These mooks have fangs!"
abilities:
'Swarm' — 'Weapons' cannot defend against the Mooks.

If the Mooks are successful, instead of killing the Victim, you may choose to Knock them Out instead. If so, after the attack, the Mooks return to their Owner's hand.
title: Cluster

name: Skippy the Undead Hellhound
quote: "W-what's that Skippy? AHHH! NO!" GAK! ARGH! GURGLE!
abilities: "Skippy" Characters cannot defend against the Hellhound.
title: Dog

name: Creepy Old Library
quote: "In the battle of the supernatural, always remember: Overdue books are scarier than vampires."
abilities:
Pay 2 Popcorn on your turn — Search your Deck for a 'Book' Prop and play it in your Movie. Reshuffle your Deck afterwards.

You may discard a 'Book' Prop from your Movie to generate 2 Popcorn.
title: Librarian

name: Cemetery
quote: "They're coming to get you, Barbara!"
abilities: May be attached to the "House By The Cemetery" or any 'Holy' or 'Mortuary' Location. 'Zombie' Attacks always succeed in the Cemetery.
title: Through

name: Sharp Stake
quote: "Fun fact: A stake through the heart kills humans just as well as vampires."
abilities: Discard from play to stop a 'Vampire' attack made against your Movie. Remove that 'Vampire' from the game.
title: Impaled

name: Crucifix
quote: "You have to have faith for that to work!"
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn and discard from play — Stop a 'Vampire' attack made against your Movie. Pay no Popcorn if in the hands of any "Priest", "Minister", "Reverend", or "Cleric".
title: Cross

name: Portal to Hell
quote: "Where do you think THAT goes?" "No place good!"
abilities: Spend 2X Popcorn to take X Creature cards out of your Graveyard and make a single Attack with all of them Combined.
title: Swarm

name: Hiss and Flee!
quote: "Crap! They really do that??"
abilities: Put target 'Vampire' currently in play that you control into your hand.
title: Hissing

name: Vegetarian Vamps
quote: "Killing humans is wrong, man!"
abilities: Play during a 'Vampire' attack to cut the Attack Strength in half (rounded down).
title: Angel

name: ...But Wait... There's TWO of You?
quote: "But... but I'M the chosen one!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, when you are under attack and have at least one Character you may Bank this Twist. If you do, play this card in your Movie. It becomes a complete copy of ONE of your Characters and joins in on the attack. If the double is killed, return this card as a normal Banked Twist to your Movie.
title: Double

name: ...But They Were Invited In!
quote: "How did you get in here??" "Billy... invited me."
abilities: Starting your next turn, if a 'Vampire' attack you've launched is against a 'Building' or 'Indoors' Location, you may Bank this Twist. If you do it automatically succeeds.
title: Threshold

name: Roll the Credits! (3)
quote: "Well, that Hell Maw thing closed and the ghouly things are all gone so it must be over!"
title: Summer

name: Dhampir
quote: "Damn vampire!" "It's pronounced 'Dham-PEER,' actually."
abilities:
Can have the 'Vampire' Trait when convenient.

'Vampire' — May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Cannot defend against 'Vampires'). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.
title: Handy

name: Alucard
quote: "Heheh, they'll never know who I REALLY am... Idiots."
abilities: 'Vampire' — May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Cannot defend against 'Vampires'). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.
title: Hellsing

name: Vampiretta
quote: "She's like a Vampire but... a WOMAN."
abilities:
'Male' Duel targets are at -2 Defense.

'Vampire' — May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Cannot defend against 'Vampires'). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.
title: Vampiress

name: Space Vampires
quote: "In space, no one can hear you bleed."
abilities: Automatically succeeds in any 'Alien' Location.
title: Orbit

name: Gothic Lolita Vampiress
quote: "So, what's your schtick, princess?" "I eat child molesters." "Ah..."
abilities: NON-'Young' Characters cannot defend against the Lolita. She also cannot choose a 'Young' Victim.
title: Lolita

name: Carmilla
quote: "Oh! Oh! Take me! Take me!" "You're not my type..."
abilities: 'Female' Characters cannot defend against Carmilla. And if she kills a female Victim she returns to her owner's hand.
title: Sapphic

name: Dark Alleyways
quote: "Wait! I know a shortcut..."
abilities: 'Vampire' and 'Psycho' attacks always succeed here.
title: Shadows

name: Isolated Village
quote: "It says on the sign, 'Fang-free since 1692.' But it was recently crossed out..."
abilities: 'Vampire' attacks that fail against the Village go back to their Owner's hand instead of the Graveyard.
title: Through

name: Silver Bullet
quote: "The silver cathedral cross was melted for the alloy." "Isn't that sacreligious?"
abilities: Discard from play to stop a 'Supernatural' attack made against your Movie.
title: Silver

name: Heirloom Sword
quote: "My father's father's father's— it's OLD okay?"
abilities: 'Treasure' — Defense = 5 towards the final score.
title: Slice

name: Production Value
quote: "It's the cleavage. Monsters are distracted by cleavage."
abilities: Attach this card to a Female Character. She gains +2 Defense.
title: Bosom

name: Blood Healing
quote: "Is that puddle of blood... MOVING?"
abilities: Sacrifice one of your Characters to prevent a 'Vampire' from landing in your Graveyard. Instead place the 'Vampire' into your hand.
title: Unlife

name: Elaborate Death Scene
quote: "Fire, broken glass, explosives, silver bullets, AND a chicken for good measure..."
abilities: Double the Strength of the current attack.
title: Elaborate

name: ...But They Found a Blood Cure!
quote: "You see, Vampirism was merely a disease."
abilities: Starting your next turn, if you have at least 3 'Vampire' Characters in your Movie you may Bank this Twist. If you do, Bank 1 point for every 'Vampire' in play. From this point forward, all Characters lose the trait 'Vampire'.
title: Cure

name:
...But Their Name Written
Backwards Was...!
quote: "Foolish mortal! My name isn't ALUCARD!"
abilities: Play with a 'Vampire' Creature face-down under it. Starting your next turn, if you have a 'Vampire' Character in your Movie you may Bank this Twist. If you do, Bank the 'Vampire' Character's Printed Defense and remove them from the game. Then attack with the Creature for free.
title: Alucard

name: Roll the Credits! (4)
quote: "That was FAR too much blood... I guess it's over!"
title: Hunter

name: Renfield
quote: "Crazy? I was crazy once..."
abilities:
'Ghoul' — Cannot defend against 'Vampires'.

Whenever a Character in Renfield's Movie dies, he gains +1 Defense permanently, and the trait 'Drunk' until the end of the turn.
title: Master

name: Mina Murray
quote: "She is one of God's women, fashioned by His own hand." "Gotta watch those hands..."
abilities:
If a 'Vampire' attack is successful against her Movie, she loses the trait 'Virgin'.

Defense = 4 if "Jonathan Harker" or "Van Helsing" is in the same Movie.
title: Betrothed

name: Lucy Westenra
quote: "All this weakness comes to me in sleep..." "Stay away from decaf?"
abilities: For 2 Popcorn, Lucy can be played from your Graveyard as a 'Supernatural' 'Vampire' attack with an Attack Strength of 12. 'Young' Characters cannot defend against her. After the attack is resolved she is removed from the game.
title: Weak

name: Very Old Man
quote: "There is much to be learned from beasts."
abilities: Can be played as a Special Effect to double the Attack of "Hariy Old Man" or "Scary Old Man". If all three cards are played in the same attack, if successful you may claim an additional victim.
title: Very

name: Scary Old Man
quote:
"Look what your god has done to me!"
"Yep. He definitely has a sense of humor."
abilities:
Can be played as a Special Effect to double the Attack of "Hariy Old Man" or "Very Old Man".

'Supernatural' Props cannot defend against the Old Man.
title: Scary

name: Hairy Old Man
quote: "Say, 'Fetch!' young man. I dare you."
abilities:
Can be played as a Special Effect to double the Attack of "Very Old Man" or "Scary Old Man".

'Werewolf' — You may Knock Out one 'Werewolf' Character in your own Movie to double the Old Man's Attack Strength. If it fails that Character dies.
title: Hairy

name: Somewhere in Transylvania
quote: "We have a saying here: Life is short, but our nights are eternal!"
abilities: 'Vampire' Charaters get +2 Defense in Transylvania.
title: Transylvania

name: Old Abbey
quote: "Oh look! Carfax is for sale again."
abilities: You may pay additional Popcorn to play the Old Abbey. So long as it's in play, any Player may, on their turn, purchase the Abbey (i.e. play it in their own Movie) if they pay more Popcorn than the last Player did for it.
title: Real

name: Bottle of Wine
quote: "I never drink.... wine."
abilities: Discard from play to give a target Character -2 Defense and the Trait 'Drunk' until the end of the turn.
title: Vintage

name: Communion Wafers
quote: "The body of Christ compells you!"
abilities: Defense = 5 against 'Vampire' attacks. Discard from play to remove the trait 'Vampire' from any card in play.
title: Sanctified

name: Me and My Shadow
quote: "Yeah... something's REALLY fishy about that guy."
abilities: Attach the Shadow to a Character. Any of their activated Abilities require 1 extra Popcorn to activate.
title: Shadow

name: Hairy Palms
quote: "High five, man!" "... Uh..."
abilities: Attach to a Character. Their Defense is at -2.
title: Hands

name: Mind Control Stare
quote: "You are getting very sleepy..."
abilities: Knock Out target Character. They are 'Unlucky' until they wake back up.
title: Sleepy

name: ...But That Wasn't in the Book!
quote: "Hey! Wait! What really happened was..."
abilities: Play another card other than a Plot Twist face-down under this Twist. Starting your next turn you may Bank this Twist. If you do, reveal the card. Provided it doesn't break any rules, you may discard any other card of the same type currently in play and replace it with the card under this Twist. Play resumes normally.
title: Switch

name:
...But They Made an
Heroic Sacrifice!
quote: "No! Leave them alone! Take me!"
abilities: When you are successfully attacked and your Opponent has chosen the Victim, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, you must choose a different Victim among ANY of the Characters in your Movie. (You may ignore 'Unlucky', restrictions imposed by a Creature's abilites, etc.) Bank the new Victim's Printed Defense.
title: Sacrifice

name: Roll the Credits! (5)
quote: "Well, the big bad vampire turned back into a human when he died. So I guess it's over!"
title: Summer

name: Vampire Vampire Hunter
quote: "Yeah, I'm a vampire who hunts vampires." "Isn't that, like, cannibalism?" "Uhm..."
abilities:
Defense = 5 against 'Vampires'.

'Vampire' — May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Cannot defend against 'Vampires'). On failure, the Hunter is Knocked Out. Unless the target's a 'Vampire': Then the Duel is to the death.
title: Blade

name: Girl With Oddly Convenient Occupation
quote: "If we only had a quantum phlebotomist!" "I'm a quantum phlebotomist."
abilities: When the Girl is cast in a Movie, choose a Trait. Her Defense = 3 against attacks with that Trait.
title: Device

name: Cop Who Knows
quote: "Vampires, monsters, yeah! They're all real. Now help me barricade the door!"
abilities:
Defense = 4 against 'Supernatural' attacks.

Cop — 'Gun' Props' Defense are x2 in his hands.
title: Savvy

name: Crime Boss Vampire
quote: "You think you can kill me? All you've killed here is my suit!"
abilities:
When the Crime Boss attacks, you may discard one 'Vehicle' from the target Movie.

'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Boss' attack for free.
title: Mafia

name: Night Club Vampires
quote: "They really put the rave in graveyard!"
abilities:
If successful the Vampires may kill ANY character in the target Movie who doesn't have either the 'Young' or 'Old' Trait.

'Cool' 'Swarm' — Special Effects cannot be played against the Vampires and 'Weapon' Props' cannot defend against them.
title: Dance

name: Giant Blob Vampire
quote: "I don't count calories! I count victims..."
abilities: When you attack with the Blob Vampire, you may kill any number of Characters in your Movie. For each Character you do, the Blob Vampire gets +10 Attack. For every two Characters killed this way, if successful they may claim an additional Victim.
title: Ginormous

name: Undead Rave
quote: "Cause this is thriller! Thriller night!"
abilities:
'Events' can Combine with an existing Location that shares a Trait other than 'Event'.

NON-'Supernatural' attacks against the Rave cannot target 'Vampires'.
title: Rave

name: Frozen Meat Locker
quote: "When you think about it, a body is only made up of so much meat."
abilities: Every NON-'Vampire' Character in the Locker is at -1 Defense.
title: Meat

name: Handcuffs
quote: "Ooo.. kinky!"
abilities: Comes into play tipped. Knock out the Character wearing the Handcuffs. They do not wake up when their Director Fills Up at the beginning of their turn. The Handcuffs cannot be moved to another Character, but on their turn their controller may pay 3 Popcorn to discard them. May be played into an Opponent's Movie.
title: Bound

name: Garlic
quote: "You'll need garlic. Lots of garlic... Garlic up to your ASS!"
abilities: Defense = 5 against 'Vampire' Attacks.
title: Odor

name: Risen From the Grave
quote: "My god! You're a vampire!" "I prefer the term 'living impaired.'"
abilities: Anytime, except during an attack, take a Character from any Graveyard and launch a 'Supernatural' 'Vampire' attack with a Strength of 3x the printed Defense of the Character. If it succeeds, play them in your Movie and attach this card to them. They now have the Trait 'Vampire' and its abilities.
title: Arisen

name: Fire in the Hole!
quote: "Burn, baby, burn! Undead inferno!"
abilities: Remove one Location or 'Vehicle' from play OR stop one attack made by a "Mummy", 'Zombie', or any 'Vampire'.
title: Inferno

name: Full Frontal Nudity
quote: "Hey! We have standards here! Double standards... but standards!"
abilities: Attach to any NON-'Virgin' 'Female' Character to give her +2 Defense OR kill a NON-'Virgin' 'Male' in any Movie.
title: Naked

name:
... But She Was
With Them All Along!
quote: "M-mom? What are you doing with HIM?"
abilities: Starting your next turn, if you have a 'Male' 'Vampire' cast in your Movie and there is a NON-'Virgin' 'Female' Character in any Graveyard, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, play the 'Female' Character into your Movie, and they both gain the trait 'Family'.
title: Infidelity

name:
... But They Bit Off More
Than They Could Chew!
quote: "So... the bad news is that I missed one."
abilities: If a NON-'Vampire' Character in your Movie is killed, you may Bank this Twist. If you do, instead of landing in the Graveyard, shuffle them back into your Deck. When they are next Cast in your Movie, they gain the trait 'Vampire' [May make 'Supernatural' Duels. On success, the Victim gains 'Ghoul' (Defense against 'Vampire' attacks = 0). On failure, the Vampire is Knocked Out.].
title: Rushed

quote: "Well the vamp decided to walk off into the sunrise... So I guess it's over!"
title: Innocent

name: Garlic
quote: "Lots of garlic... Garlic up to your ASS!"
abilities: Defense = 5 against 'Vampire' Attacks.
title: Odor

name: Dracula
quote: "The spider spinning his web for the unwary fly... I should really clean this place up!"
abilities: If an attack with Dracula is successful, you may discard a Character or Creature from your hand to take Dracula back into your hand.
title: Dracula
